faq.TITLE: FAQ
faq.QUESTION1: What can I do about an Dirstuff product I bought that is defective?
faq.ANSWER1: If you are dissatisfied with the quality of your Dirstuff product, please contact with us through our website www.dirstuff.com/#/contact and let us know your problem, we will answer you as soon as possible.
faq.QUESTION2: Where can I buy Dirstuff products?
faq.ANSWER2: Our product is not for sale, if you want to get one of our products, support our Kickstarter campaign.
faq.QUESTION3: What is the life time of my <DIRS> T-Shirt?
faq.ANSWER3: A <DIRS> T-Shirt has an estimated life time of 5.4 years.
faq.QUESTION4: What is the composition of a pack of letters?
faq.ANSWER4: A pack of letters is composed of 85 characters distributed in such a way that you can form any word.
faq.QUESTION5: How can I use all the advantages of a <DIRS> T-Shirt?
faq.ANSWER5: You can use a <DIRS> T-Shirt to promote your business, express your opinions or your criteria.
faq.QUESTION6: Can I have an account at <DIRS> Portal without having a <DIRS> T-Shirt?
faq.ANSWER6: If you can create an account in <DIRS> portal without owning a <DIRS> T-Shirt and use all the features of the portal to generate your own QR code.
faq.QUESTION7: How can I link a <DIRS> T-Shirt to my profile?
faq.ANSWER7: If you already own an account at <DIRS> portal and then you get a <DIRS> t-shirts You can in your profile link the code of your <DIRS> t-shirts with your profile on <DIRS> portal.
faq.QUESTION8: Can I use my QR code where I want?
faq.ANSWER8: Yes, you can download your QR code and use it anywhere you deee, so take advantage of all the features of the <DIRS> portal.
faq.ANSWER9: A snippet is a fragment of text, links or any idea you wish to express.
faq.QUESTION10: How can I add my social networks?
faq.ANSWER10: On the User profile page you can press the Add 'Social Network' button and choose the social network you want to add and in the 'url' field enter the URL of your social network.
faq.QUESTION11: Can I delete my social networks and snippets?
faq.ANSWER11: Yes, you can delete any of the data put in your profile, press the 'Edit Profile' button and delete the data that you do not want displayed in your profile.
faq.QUESTION12: Can I hide my profile or some data on it?
faq.ANSWER12: Each user can put their hidden profile, in the configuration section you can enable or disable your profile to be visible or not in <DIRS> Portal.

privacy.TITLE: Privacy Policy
privacy.SUB_TITLE: Our privacy policies must be respected by all users
privacy.HEADER: Your privacy is very important to us. Accordingly, we have developed this Policy in order for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of personal information. The following outlines our privacy policy.
privacy.FOOTER: We are committed to conducting our business in accordance with these principles in order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained.
privacy.TEXT1: Before or at the time of collecting personal information, we will identify the purposes for which information is being collected.
privacy.TEXT2: We will collect and use of personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law.
privacy.TEXT3: We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes.
privacy.TEXT4: We will collect personal information by lawful and fair means and, where appropriate, with the knowledge or consent of the individual concerned.
privacy.TEXT5: Personal data should be relevant to the purposes for which it is to be used, and, to the extent necessary for those purposes, should be accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
privacy.TEXT6: We will protect personal information by reasonable security safeguards against loss or theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacy.TEXT7: We will make readily available to customers information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information.

terms.TITLE: Web Site Terms and Conditions of Use
terms.SUB_TITLE: Content regulations and use of our website
terms.SUB_TERM1: By accessing this web site, you are agreeing to be bound by these web site Terms and Conditions of Use, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site. The materials contained in this web site are protected by applicable copyright and trade mark law.

terms.LICENSE4: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or
terms.LICENSE5: transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.
terms.LICENSE_SUB2: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by DIRSTUFF at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether in electronic or printed format.
terms.DISCLAIMER_SUB: The materials on DIRSTUFF's web site are provided 'as is'. DIRSTUFF makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties, including without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights. Because some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties, or limitations of liability for consequential or incidental damages, these limitations may not apply to you.

DIRSTUFF does not warrant that any of the materials on its web site are accurate, complete, or current. DIRSTUFF may make changes to the materials contained on its web site at any time without notice. DIRSTUFF does not, however, make any commitment to update the materials.
